4308470.name: Sewer Mole
4308470.description:
They're in it now. The city is running out of time. Mutant animals are rising from underground tunnels to take what is theirs. The Sewer Mole stands in between them as he dashes digs and blasts his way to expand the cities sewage system. It's the other way around, they're in it with him.

Gameplay

This gameplay is built to be picked up and played.

  • Shooting Mode: Moment by moment, the mutants are coming, shoot straight.

  • Radar Map Mode: When you tunnel through the sludge, don't hit your own tunnel/path.

  • Enemies: Mutants come with sharp teeth but they all go back into the dirt, just aim right.

Visuals

  • Retro Grime Art Style: If it's wet pixel grit you're digging for, you'll soak it in.

Audio:

  • Dirt Crushed OST: Carefully crafted tracks for a specialized crunched sound.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
